item.title: Technologies and dependencies
item.description: Logo Description License BrickSim uses C++. The main reason for this choice was execution speed. - BrickSim is built using the platform-independent build system CMake. BSD 3-clause The User Interface is made with Dear ImGui. MIT OpenGL is used for rendering on all platforms. - SQLite3 is used to save settings and cache to the disk.

item.title: Code structure
item.description: Folder Purpose /.github GitHub-specific things like Actions Workflows /.idea CLion configuration /.vscode VS Code configuration /cmake-build This folder is ignored in .gitignore. You should set the CMake build directory to /cmake-build/debug64 in the Debug 64bit configuration for example. /docs This is the root of the BrickSim.org Website. Do not edit the content of this directory, it is automatically updated when someone pushes to master in the BrickSimWeb repository.
